attributes.action: To give us hard working English Folk a break, we work to hard!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Gordan,

The people of england are crying out to have one monday of a month. The work ethic in England has become to dull and monday mornings are becomming harder and harder. Give yourself a break while your at it. We all need somethign to look forward too.. Anyway, peace love and chilaxe to the max in your Prem..

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
